overview:
A disciple of simplicity and usability through design. Fernando has an inate ability to solve problems with analytical to creative solutions. A relative newbie to the realm of programming.

Developed and Designed NYC Travel, Drynks, Interview and My Travel Buddy for Windows Phone. We also partnered up with ScanBizCards to release it on the Windows Phone platform.
